data.title: MediaCoder Alternative to Convert Video
data.meta_description: This article mainly introduces an alternative to MediaCoder for you to convert video/audio files in Windows system easily and successfully.
data.text:
To convert video/audio in Windows (Including Windows 8) system, people usually turn to MediaCoder, media transcoder software which combines many widely used audio/video codecs. With this program, you can achieve the following function: compression, file type conversion and extraction of audio from video files. Similarly, Aimersoft Video Converter Ultimate for Windows (Windows 8 compatible) is recommended to the MediaCoder alternative to convert video/audio files.

Why people choose Aimersoft Video Converter Ultimate for Windows (Including Windows 8) as the alternative to MediaCoder? Aimersoft Video Converter Ultimate for Windows (Including Windows 8) is a powerful program to convert video and DVD, burn video to DVD, and download online videos and edit your home videos etc.

Aimersoft Video Converter Ultimate for Windows has a simple navigating interface. Even a green hand can handle it easily. The picture below is the screenshot of the interface of it.

The main features of Aimersoft Video Converter Ultimate for Windows include:

Convert video to virtually all formats

It supports converting videos either downloaded from online or taken by camcorders to over 30 major formats, including AVI, WMV, FLV, MOV, MP4, ASF, VOB, MKV, MTS, TS, TRP, etc. Moreover, you can use it to crack DRM protection from video/audio files purchased from iTunes, Zune, Amazon, etc.

Rip DVD to all popular formats

It can rip and convert DVD to all widely used formats such as WMV, AVI, MP4, etc. and even to HD video formats like HD MOV, HD WMV, and HD AVI. The conversion process will make out high quality videos without compressing the original quality of DVD. The extraction of audio from DVD to MP3, WMA, ACC, etc. is also offered.

Burn any video to DVD

It can burn any video to DVD in very simple operation, meanwhile give you plenty choices of personalized adjustments to your DVD. You can add subtitle, background music and photos.
